description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/orangutan
condition presented to participants - clear / opaque cued / tool
number of repeated trials until they succeed
trial order without the missing spots of those trials that were not included in the final dataset
level of planning required to succeed from 0 to 2 depending whether they had to consider the traps on the uppermost level only- on the ahead or on second level or the third level underneath
number of levels that contain a trap (1-2)
whether a change in direction is necessary for the removal of the reward or not (0= no/ 1= yes)
how often this maze configuration was mal already presented to the participant (1-2)
whether the first decision in the first attempt was correct (0= incorrect/ 1=correct)
whether the first attempt to retrieve the food was successful (0= no/ 1= yes)
chance value for the number of trials
